channel.title: Your way of charming a boy / girl?
channel.description:
I'm not asking for advice, I'd simply like to know how members of the community charm a boy / girl they like.
/discuss.

item.title: Your way of charming a boy / girl?
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

I just slap their ass, and they do the rest.

The male leans down over the female during sex then strongly grips the breasts then says into the ear of the female something that would cause her to frantically try to get away (i have aids, your sister was better, where did this rash on my dick come from?, your a lot better than that cold girl i met in the morgue, etc…)
